author: jeremias
msg: Avoid exception when ImageIO is used as image adapter for TIFF images. The stream is already closed and the bitmap loaded when FopPDFImages wants to write the image to the PDF.

author: jeremias
msg: Bugfix: CCITT Group 4 encoded TIFF images were not properly embedded in PDF files. FopPDFImage always used the bits/pixel and color space of the original image although our image adapter mostly convert all images to 24bit RGB. One day, we will need to improve the image handling.

author: carnold
msg: Degrading to junit3 to avoid Ant bug introduced 10-Mar-2006

author: bruno
msg: Start component type names with a capital.
